ModMetaData.name: AllowToolGhoulFix
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
This is a patch to fix allow tool causing Ghoul melee disabled issue. The mod is patch the FinishOff worktype def and remove the relevantSkills field.
If you have other mods that has similar issue, you can do the same by changing their mod files. Allow Tool might not be the only mod that causes the issue.
